CheckerPage.addressesPlaceholder: Insert wallet addresses divided by line, comma, semicolon, tab or space
CheckerPage.concurrentFetches: Number of concurrent requests by address
CheckerPage.addressesPlaceholderDisabled: First enable address display by clicking on the header in the table

LayerZero.description: Due to the peculiarities of API LayerZeroScan in the table shows data only on the last 100 transactions of the wallet (the number of transactions is shown correctly). And also transactions are counted from 01-05-2024, the snapshot date.

Eclipse.description: Due to the peculiarities of the Eclipsescan API, the table displays data only on transactions made after January 1, 2025, because of this the number of tap counts may not be displayed if the creation was last year.

Odos.description: All transactions and data counted from the last snapshot date, 2024-12-16.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: The site is entirely developed by <button>b0r9f3d9</button> for the purpose of checking the statistics of his wallets in the projects.
